targets.rawSql:
SELECT
                  comment_time AS time,
                  AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_sentiment
                FROM absa_monitoring_data
                WHERE $__timeFilter(comment_time)
                GROUP BY time
                ORDER BY time

SELECT
                  CASE polarity
                    WHEN 0 THEN 'Positive'
                    WHEN 1 THEN 'Negative'
                    WHEN 2 THEN 'Neutral'
                    ELSE 'Unknown'
                  END AS label,
                  COUNT(*) AS value
                FROM absa_monitoring_data
                WHERE $__timeFilter(comment_time)
                GROUP BY polarity

SELECT aspectterm, COUNT(*) AS frequency
                FROM absa_monitoring_data
                WHERE $__timeFilter(comment_time)
                GROUP BY aspectterm
                ORDER BY frequency DESC
                LIMIT 10

SELECT COUNT(*) as count
                FROM absa_monitoring_data
                WHERE overall_drift_detected = true AND $__timeFilter(comment_time)

SELECT
                  comment_time AS time,
                  AVG(engagement_score) AS avg_engagement
                FROM absa_monitoring_data
                WHERE $__timeFilter(comment_time)
                GROUP BY time
                ORDER BY time
